vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Kirksey Architects, Inc. dba Kirksey Architecture for architectural and engineering services for the schematic design, design development, construction documents, bidding and negotiation, and construction administration for the Exall Recreation Center Replacement Project located at 1355 Adair Street - Not to exceed $1,624,571.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2024 General Obligation Bond Fund)
